Package com.jogamp.opengl.impl.glu.nurbs

Interface Summary
CurveEvaluator Class rendering curves with OpenGL
SurfaceEvaluator Class rendering surfaces with OpenGL
 

Class Summary
Arc Trimming arc
ArcSdirSorter Class for sorting list of Arcs
ArcTdirSorter Class for sorting list of Arcs
ArcTesselator Class for arc tesselation
Backend Class responsible for rendering
BezierArc Empty class
Bin Class holding trimming arcs
Breakpt Class holding break point parameters
CArrayOfArcs Class replacing C language pointer
CArrayOfBreakpts Class replacing C language pointer
CArrayOfFloats Class replacing C language pointer
CArrayOfQuiltspecs Class replacing C language pointer
Curve Class holding curve definition
Curvelist Class for woking with linked list of curves
DisplayList Display list
Flist List of breakpoints
Knotspec Knot vector specification
Knotvector Knot vector used in curve specification
Mapdesc Class holding properties of OpenGL map
Maplist Class holding list of Mapdescs
NurbsConsts Class hodling NURBS constants as seen in OpenGL GLU documentation
O_curve Struct holding curve links
O_nurbscurve NURBS curve object
O_nurbssurface NURBS surface object
O_pwlcurve Empty class
O_surface Surface object
O_trim Empty class
Patch Empty class
Patchlist List of patches
Property Class representing property
Pspec Class holding range
PwlArc Picewiselinar trimming arc
Quilt Class for converting NURBS curves and surfaces to list of bezier arcs or patches repectively
Quiltspec Quilt definition
Renderhints Class holding rendering params
Splinespec NURBS definition
Subdivider Class working with curves and surfaces
TrimVertex Holds vertex used in trim
